symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.recommendation: Stay hydrated, rest, and take fever-reducing medications if needed.

symptoms.name: Cough
symptoms.recommendation: Drink warm fluids, use cough drops, and consider a humidifier.

symptoms.name: Fatigue
symptoms.recommendation: Get adequate rest, maintain a balanced diet, and stay hydrated.

symptoms.name: Headache
symptoms.recommendation: Drink water, rest in a quiet place, use hot or cold compresses on your head, and use pain relievers if necessary.

symptoms.name: Shortness-of-reath
symptoms.recommendation: Practice deep breathing, avoid triggers, stop exercise if necessary and seek medical attention if severe.

symptoms.name: Nausea
symptoms.recommendation: Try drinking tea, drink clear/cold liquids, don't mix hot and cold foods, eat bland foods, and avoid strong odors.

symptoms.name: Dizziness
symptoms.recommendation: Sit or lie down, hydrate, and avoid sudden movements.

symptoms.name: Sore-throat
symptoms.recommendation: Gargle warm salt water, drink warm teas, and use throat lozenges.

symptoms.name: Muscle-pain
symptoms.recommendation: Apply heat or cold packs, stretch gently, take over-the-counter pain relievers, and stay hydrated.

symptoms.name: Joint-pain
symptoms.recommendation: Use anti-inflammatory medications, rest, and apply ice packs.

symptoms.name: Chest-pain
symptoms.recommendation: Rest, lie down, avoid heavy exertion, and seek immediate medical attention if severe.

symptoms.name: Runny-nose
symptoms.recommendation: Use saline nasal spray, drink warm fluids, inhale steam, and rest.

symptoms.name: Vomiting
symptoms.recommendation: Sip clear fluids, eat small bland meals, and consider rest and quiet surroundings.

symptoms.name: Diarrhea
symptoms.recommendation: Stay hydrated, eat a BRAT diet (bananas, rice, applesauce, toast), and avoid dairy.

symptoms.name: Constipation
symptoms.recommendation: Increase fiber intake, drink plenty of water, and exercise regularly.

symptoms.name: Rash
symptoms.recommendation: Avoid irritants, apply soothing lotions, and keep the skin moisturized. If it severes, contact a doctor.

symptoms.name: Chills
symptoms.recommendation: Keep warm, drink warm fluids, and rest.

symptoms.name: Sweating
symptoms.recommendation: Stay cool, drink water, and wear breathable clothing.

symptoms.name: Abdominal-pain
symptoms.recommendation: Apply heat, eat light meals, and avoid spicy or fatty foods.

symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.recommendation: Elevate the affected area, apply ice packs, and reduce salt intake.
